emails.body: Thank you for taking the time to review this message. It contains a detailed update related to the subject line, including background context, current status, and any actions that may be required. The intention is to provide clear, practical information you can use immediately, without needing to track down additional references. Where relevant, we outline timelines, ownership, and potential risks to watch. If something needs attention, it is summarized plainly and repeated near the end. We also include helpful links or pointers to follow-up threads when applicable. Please reply if anything is unclear, if you need more depth, or if priorities have changed since the last update.

emails.subject: Zest: Bring AI Coworkers to Slack that know your apps
emails.snippet: Bring AI Coworkers to Slack that know your app
emails.body: We are excited to announce that we are launching a new product called Zest. Zest is a tool that allows you to bring AI Coworkers to Slack that know your app. We are currently in beta and we would love to have you try it out. You can sign up for the beta at https://heyzest.ai. We are also looking for feedback on the product. Please let us know what you think.
